mapper.sql: wod.id, wod.order_no, wod.line_no,wod.status,wod.buyer_code, wod.sku_code,wod.generic_sku_code,wod.outbound_num,wod.outbound_origin_num,wod.outbound_alloc_num, wod.outbound_pick_num,wod.outbound_ship_num,wod.outbound_price,wod.cost, wod.is_create_voucher,wod.voucher_no,wod.is_create_cost_voucher,wod.cost_voucher_no,wod.plan_ship_loc, wod.is_cross_dock,wod.inbound_order_no,wod.inbound_line_no, wod.remark, wod.creator, wod.create_time,wod.modifier, wod.modify_time, wod.rec_ver, wod.company_id, wod.warehouse_id
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO wm_outbound_detail (id, order_no, line_no, sku_code,generic_sku_code,buyer_code,status, outbound_num, outbound_origin_num,outbound_alloc_num,outbound_pick_num,outbound_ship_num,outbound_price,cost,is_create_voucher,voucher_no,is_create_cost_voucher,cost_voucher_no,plan_ship_loc, is_cross_dock,inbound_order_no,inbound_line_no, remark,creator, create_time, modifier, modify_time, rec_ver, company_id, warehouse_id) VALUES
(#{item.id}, #{item.orderNo},#{item.lineNo}, #{item.skuCode},#{item.genericSkuCode},#{item.buyerCode},#{item.status},#{item.outboundNum},#{item.outboundOriginNum},#{item.outboundAllocNum},#{item.outboundPickNum},#{item.outboundShipNum},#{item.outboundPrice}, #{item.cost},#{item.isCreateVoucher},#{item.isCreateVoucher},#{item.isCreateCostVoucher},#{item.costVoucherNo},#{item.planShipLoc},#{item.isCrossDock},#{item.inboundOrderNo},#{item.inboundLineNo}, #{item.remark},#{item.creator},#{item.createTime}, #{item.modifier}, #{item.modifyTime}, #{item.recVer}, #{item.companyId},#{item.warehouseId})
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM wm_outbound_detail WHERE id in
#{item}
mapper.select:
select
,bfs.fitting_sku_name as sku_name, bfs.model_code, bfs.group_code, bfs.quick_code, bfs.need_to_assemble, bfs.package_code, bfs.uom_desc, bc.customer_name as buyer_name from wm_outbound_detail wod left join bd_fitting_sku bfs on bfs.fitting_sku_code = wod.sku_code and bfs.company_id = wod.company_id left join bd_customer bc on bc.customer_code = wod.buyer_code and bc.company_id = wod.company_id

select
,bfs.fitting_sku_name as sku_name, bfs.model_code, bfs.quick_code, bc.customer_name as buyer_name from wm_outbound_detail wod left join bd_fitting_sku bfs on bfs.fitting_sku_code = wod.sku_code and bfs.company_id = wod.company_id left join bd_customer bc on bc.customer_code = wod.buyer_code and bc.company_id = wod.company_id where wod.order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and wod.line_no = #{lineNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and wod.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and wod.warehouse_id = #{warehouseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
,bfs.fitting_sku_name as sku_name, bfs.model_code, bfs.quick_code, bc.customer_name as buyer_name from wm_outbound_detail wod left join bd_fitting_sku bfs on bfs.fitting_sku_code = wod.sku_code and bfs.company_id = wod.company_id left join bd_customer bc on bc.customer_code = wod.buyer_code and bc.company_id = wod.company_id where wod.order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and wod.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and wod.warehouse_id = #{warehouseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT bfs.fitting_sku_name, bfs.model_code, bfs.package_code, wod.sku_code, wod.buyer_code, wod.cost, bc.customer_name, wod.modify_time, wod.outbound_num, wod.outbound_price, wod.cost FROM wm_outbound_detail wod LEFT JOIN bd_fitting_sku bfs ON bfs.company_id = wod.company_id AND bfs.fitting_sku_code = wod.sku_code LEFT JOIN bd_customer bc ON bc.customer_code = wod.buyer_code AND bc.company_id = wod.company_id WHERE 1=1 and wod.status = '80' and wod.buyer_code = #{buyerCode} AND bfs.fitting_sku_name LIKE CONCAT('%','${fittingSkuName}','%') AND bfs.model_code LIKE CONCAT('%','${modelCode}','%') AND bfs.fitting_type_code = #{fittingTypeCode} and wod.sku_code = #{fittingSkuCode} AND wod.modify_time >= #{orderTimeFm} AND wod.modify_time <= #{orderTimeTo} and wod.company_id = #{companyId} and wod.warehouse_id = #{warehouseId} order by wod.buyer_code,wod.sku_code,wod.create_time desc
